name: Shroud [Revival]

WANT TO PLAY FULLSCREEN?

DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS BUILD BELOW!

SCAVENGE_LOOT_ ___EXPLORE_SECRETS You're Shelly. You scavenge the wasteland for goods to trade with your best friend, Scrapmonger. You've been homesick recently, so you've resolved to save up for a bus ticket.

Good luck out there! _CONTROLS
